record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2488
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2488 -- (House of Representatives - July 17, 2008)

[Page: H6710]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to remove my name from a bill, H.R. 2488.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New York?
